member.name: T:TaborElectronics.WX218x.Interop.IWX218x
member.summary: IWX218x interface.

member.name: M:TaborElectronics.WX218x.Interop.IWX218x.Initialize(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Opens the I/O session to the instrument. Driver methods and properties that access the instrument are only accessible after Initialize is called. Initialize optionally performs a Reset and queries the instrument to validate the instrument model.
member.param: An IVI logical name or an instrument specific string that identifies the address of the instrument, such as a VISA resource descriptor string.
Specifies whether to verify the ID of the instrument.
Specifies whether to reset the instrument.

The user can use the OptionsString parameter to specify the initial values of certain IVI inherent attributes for the session. The format of an assignment in the OptionsString parameteris "Name=Value", where Name is one of: RangeCheck, QuerytInstrStatus, Cache, Simulate, RecordCoercions, InterchangeCheck,or DriverSetup. Value is either true or false except for DriverSetup. If the Options String parameter contains an assignment for the Driver Setup attribute, the Initialize function assumes that everything following "DriverSetup=" is part of the assignment.

member.name: M:TaborElectronics.WX218x.Interop.IWX218x.Close
member.summary: Closes the I/O session to the instrument. Driver methods and properties that access the instrument are not accessible after Close is called.

member.summary: This method creates an arbitrary waveform from array of Data (short) values,that are already in range from 0 to 4095 (WX2181, WX2182) and from 0 to 16383 (WX2181B, WX2182B,WX2182C,WX1281B,WX1282B,WS8351,WS8352,WX2184,WX1284,WX2184C,WX1284C).

member.returns: Handle that identifies that waveform.

member.summary: This method loads pattern data in to the instrument (not for WX218x models).
member.param: The physical or virtual repeated capability identifier.

Array of data that are sended to the instrument.Values of array are depended on the level.If level = 2, possible values are: '0', '1'.If level = 3, possible values are: '0', '1', '-'.If level = 4, possible values are: '0', '1', '2', '3'.If level = 5, possible values are: '0', '1', '2', '3', '-'.

member.name: F:TaborElectronics.WX218x.Interop.WX218xAdvanceSequenceModeEnum.WX218xAdvanceSequenceModeAuto
member.summary: Specifies continuous advance where the generator steps continuously to the end of the sequence table and repeats the sequence from the start.

member.name: F:TaborElectronics.WX218x.Interop.WX218xAdvanceSequenceModeEnum.WX218xAdvanceSequenceModeOnce
member.summary: Selects the once sequence advance mode, where the generator steps through the sequence table automatically once except if the aseq:once:coun programmed a value greater than 1.

member.name: F:TaborElectronics.WX218x.Interop.WX218xAdvanceSequenceModeEnum.WX218xAdvanceSequenceModeStep
member.summary: Specifies the stepped sequence advance mode, where the generator steps to the next sequence only when a valid event signal has been received.

member.name: F:TaborElectronics.WX218x.Interop.WX218xAMInternalWaveformEnum.WX218xAMInternalWaveformSine
member.summary: Selects the sine shape as the modulating waveform.

member.name: F:TaborElectronics.WX218x.Interop.WX218xAMInternalWaveformEnum.WX218xAMInternalWaveformTriangle
member.summary: Selects the triangle shape as the modulating waveform.

member.name: F:TaborElectronics.WX218x.Interop.WX218xAMInternalWaveformEnum.WX218xAMInternalWaveformSquare
member.summary: Selects the square shape as the modulating waveform.

member.name: F:TaborElectronics.WX218x.Interop.WX218xAMInternalWaveformEnum.WX218xAMInternalWaveformRamp
member.summary: Selects the ramp shape as the modulating waveform.

member.name: F:TaborElectronics.WX218x.Interop.WX218xArbitrarySourceEnum.WX218xArbitrarySourceBus
member.summary: Defines that waveform segments will be switched only when a remote command has been received.

member.name: F:TaborElectronics.WX218x.Interop.WX218xArbitrarySourceEnum.WX218xArbitrarySourceExternal
member.summary: Defines that the segment control is transferred to a rear panel connector.

member.name: F:TaborElectronics.WX218x.Interop.WX218xArbitraryTimingEnum.WX218xArbitraryTimingCoherent
member.summary: Defines that when a new waveform segments is selected, the transition to the new waveform will occur only when the current waveform has reached its end point.

member.name: F:TaborElectronics.WX218x.Interop.WX218xArbitraryTimingEnum.WX218xArbitraryTimingImmediate
member.summary: Defines that when a new waveform segments is selected, the current waveform will be aborted and the transition to the new waveform will occur immediately without waiting for the current waveform to reach its end point.

member.name: F:TaborElectronics.WX218x.Interop.WX218xArmSlopeEnum.WX218xArmSlopePositive
member.summary: Selects the positive going edge.

member.name: F:TaborElectronics.WX218x.Interop.WX218xArmSlopeEnum.WX218xArmSlopeNegative
member.summary: Selects the negative going edge.

member.name: F:TaborElectronics.WX218x.Interop.WX218xArmSlopeEnum.WX218xArmSlopeEither
member.summary: Selects both positive and negative going edges.

member.name: F:TaborElectronics.WX218x.Interop.WX218xCarrierModulationWaveformEnum.WX218xCarrierModulationWaveformSine
member.summary: Selects sine as the modulated waveform.

member.name: F:TaborElectronics.WX218x.Interop.WX218xCarrierModulationWaveformEnum.WX218xCarrierModulationWaveformTriangle
member.summary: Selects triangle as the modulated waveform.

member.name: F:TaborElectronics.WX218x.Interop.WX218xCarrierModulationWaveformEnum.WX218xCarrierModulationWaveformSquare
member.summary: Selects square as the modulated waveform.

member.name: F:TaborElectronics.WX218x.Interop.WX218xContinuousModeEnum.WX218xContinuousModeSelf
member.summary: In continuous run mode, waveforms are generated at the output connector as soon as they are selected.

member.name: F:TaborElectronics.WX218x.Interop.WX218xContinuousModeEnum.WX218xContinuousModeArmed
member.summary: The instrument generates waveforms at the output connector only after an enab command is executed. For an immediate and unconditional termination of the output waveform use the abor command.

member.name: F:TaborElectronics.WX218x.Interop.WX218xContinuousSourceEnum.WX218xContinuousSourceBus
member.summary: Defines the source of the enable signal as a remote command. Signals at the event input will be ignored. In continuous run mode, waveforms are generated at the output connector as soon as a remote enable command is executed.

member.name: F:TaborElectronics.WX218x.Interop.WX218xContinuousSourceEnum.WX218xContinuousSourceEvent
member.summary: Defines the source of the enable signal as the event input connector. Remote enable commands will be ignored. In continuous run mode, waveforms are generated at the output connector as soon as a valid event signal is sensed at the event input connector.

member.name: F:TaborElectronics.WX218x.Interop.WX218xContinuousSourceEnum.WX218xContinuousSourceTrigger
member.summary: Defines the source of the enable signal as the front panel trigger input connector. Remote enable commands will be ignored. In continuous run mode, waveforms are generated at the output connector as soon as a valid event signal is sensed at the event input connector.

member.name: F:TaborElectronics.WX218x.Interop.WX218xSequenceJumpTimingEnum.WX218xSequenceJumpTimingCoherent
member.summary: Defines that when a new sequence is selected, the transition to the new sequence will occur only when the current sequence has reached its end point.
